body_html:
PS, a work-around is to modify to @ops.RegisterShape("SpaceToBatch") and @ops.RegisterShape("BatchToSpace") in tensorflow/python/ops/array_ops.py with


@ops.RegisterShape("BatchToSpace")
def dummy(op):
  return tensor_shape.TensorShape(None).with_rank(1)

@ops.RegisterShape("SpaceToBatch")
def dummy(op):
  return tensor_shape.TensorShape(None).with_rank(1)
